title: Deluxe Double Double
description: Deluxe Double Double Hotel Rooms in New York City at the Cosmopolitan Hotel - TriBeCa offer two double beds and accommodates up to four guests. Standard services and amenities are all included in our boutique NYC accommodations.
amenities_list:
• Two double beds
  • Accommodates up to four guests
  • Complimentary Wi-Fi
  • Work Desk
  • Flat-screen TV
  • Hair Dryer
  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities
  • Frette luxury linens and towels
  • iPod docking station
  • Cordless telephone
  • Valet Laundry
  • Movies on-demand
  • Current copy of Time Out Magazine
  • Iron and ironing board
  • In room safe
